page.title: 17Stretton House Special Unit
page.content:
Stretton House is a{residential school for boys who have problems in school or at home.
There are two{teachers}and five {houseparents}who look after the boys after school.Mr.Smith is the Principal and Mr. Chilton is the Deputy. The house has three{dormitories called McConnel, Rooth and Gratton, named after people who lived in the house. Some boys go to Stretton House teaching unit while other boys go to outside schools.
In the{grounds}there is a small farm and a nature trail. There is also a gingko tree. It is one of only seven in England. Boys{activities}include swimming, ice skating,train spotting and going on camps.
